title: School Management System (Ruebens-man-sys)
description: A web-based system for school operations with MPESA payment integration. Features: user authentication, payment processing, database optimization.

title: Developers Mate
description: AI agent for developers, automating code generation, testing, and debugging for large projects. Includes NLP, bug detection, scalable architecture.

title: e-Masomo Revamp
description: Renovated Moodle-based LMS for The Cooperative University of Kenya with Chipukizi Hive. Improved navigation, file handling, security, uptime. Led DevOps with AWS deployments, Docker, backups, Behat testing.

title: Lux Shop
description: Responsive website for a friend's jewelry and art shop. Product showcase, contact form, responsive design.
